explains: vt. 否决；统治；对……施加影响

sentences.en: It is theoretically possible for him to overrule their decision, but highly unlikely.
sentences.cn: 按理说他可以否定他们的决定，但是可能性很小。

sentences.en: If his generals disagree, he will overrule them.
sentences.cn: 如果他的将领不同意，他将否决他们。

sentences.en: As a referee, you must also be confident and alert enough to overrule your assistant when necessary.
sentences.cn: 作为一名主裁，你必须自信，并且在必要时否决助理裁判的判罚。
